courses.title: Studio Art 1
courses.description: Introduction to composition, color, and two- and three-dimensional design with work in multiple media and portfolio development.
courses.additional_notes: Can be used towards a State Regents Sequence.

courses.title: Studio Art 2
courses.description: Advanced application of concepts from Studio Art 1 with emphasis on individual growth and problem solving.
courses.prerequisite: Studio Art 1 or juniors and seniors
courses.additional_notes: Can be used towards a State Regents Sequence.

courses.title: Advanced Portfolio Development
courses.description: For juniors and seniors to work on more demanding art assignments, developing personal style and technical refinement.

courses.title: Illustrating Graphic Novels
courses.description: Combining text and image to create visual narrative storytelling and character development.
